title: I hope all our NZ players and families are safe
body:
http://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/624/cpsprodpb/DB4E/production/_92424165_newzealand_quake2016.png

A powerful magnitude-7.8 earthquake struck New Zealand's South Island. A tsunami arrived about two hours later. Officials warned everyone along the eastern coast to head inland or for higher ground.

http://www.nzherald.co.nz/49d44213-22c3-405a-8de1-eeb39c6157bf

http://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/news/article.cfm?c_id=1&objectid=11747414

http://www.bbc.com/news/world-asia-37967178

replies.body:
My friend and I were playing league at the time, he felt the earthquake during the game.

The last I heard, two people had died :(

Unfortunate.

I wonder if wool prices will go up now. Time to flip some quilts.
God I felt the earthquake. I was on my computer and i my water was shaking, after it finished I felt a little dizzy.

Oh man, I have friends in New Zealand :(
Hope everyone's ok.

Malphite Ult OP.. (its satire relax, we could all use a laugh) 

But in all seriousness i hope everyone's okay, well and safe.
Too soon man, too soon. You should've given it at least a few weeks.
